Additionally, these stops will be in place for Tuesday, April 14 - April 17.

** Note: There were no changes to bus stop locations this week.

On Monday afternoon, Clover School District received notice of a water main break impacting Bethel, Griggs Road, Kinard, Larne, Clover Middle, Clover High School, the Ninth Grade Campus, and Blue Eagle Academy. The Town of Clover has notified customers that they may want to BOIL WATER as a safety precaution. The school district will take that precaution.

Facilities will remain open for students and hand sanitizer is available in each school building for handwashing.
